entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
